metadata.title: CVE-2024-31582 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg version n6.1 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflowvulnerability in the draw_block_rectangle function oflibavfilter/vf_codecview.c. This vulnerability allows attackers to causeundefined behavior or a Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted input.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
